RDFUtils

public RDFUtils()
Method Detail

addRDFTag

public static final java.lang.String addRDFTag(java.lang.String rdf)
Parameters:
rdf - Some string in RDF/XML syntax form.
Returns:
The original string enclosed by an opening and closing top level tag <rdf:RDF xmlns:rdf="..." > respectively </rdf:RDF>.

hasRDFTag

public static final boolean hasRDFTag(java.lang.String rdf)
Parameters:
rdf - The RDF/XML string to check if it is enclosed by the opening and closing RDF/XML tags.
Returns:
true if the trimmed version of the given string starts with the opening <rdf:RDF ... > tag and ends with the closing </rdf:RDF> tag.

removeRDFTag

public static final java.lang.String removeRDFTag(java.lang.String rdf,
                                                  boolean inlineNamespaces)
Remove the outermost <rdf:RDF ...> tag from the given string.

Parameters:
rdf - Some string in RDF/XML syntax form. Leading XML processing instructions, DTD element declarations, and comments will be removed as well. More precisely, everything that comes before the <rdf:RDF ...> tag.
inlineNamespaces - If true namespace declarations (xmlns attribute) that appear in the <rdf:RDF ...> tag will not get lost but appear in-line in the result, that is, namespaces will be declared together with the elements that make use of them. Otherwise, if false, all namespace declarations in the <rdf:RDF ...> get lost.
Returns:
A string containing only elements within the <rdf:RDF ...> tag of the given string.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - May be thrown if syntax of given string is not valid RDF/XML.

toXMLLiteral

public static final OWLDataValue toXMLLiteral(OWLIndividual ind)
This method collects the blank node closure of the given individual in its associated KB and returns it in serialized form as a typed XML literal RDF.XMLLiteral. The format is RDF/XML. The literal will not be enclosed by the top level <rdf:RDF ... >, </rdf:RDF> tag. Any namespace used will appear inlined.

Parameters:
ind - The named individual to serialize.
Returns:
A typed RDF/XML literal comprising the blank node closure of the given individual.
